mapper.select: SELECT /* movie_SQL.lists */ * FROM TCM_MOVIE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.INS_DT > '20160404'
SELECT /* movie_SQL.detail */ A.MOVIE_CD ,A.MOVIE_NM ,A.GENRE_CD ,A.PRODUCTION ,A.INS_DT ,A.DEL_YN FROM TCM_MOVIE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.MOVIE_CD = #{s_movie_cd}

SELECT /* movie_SQL.movie_image_list*/ A.CODE ,A.CODE_NAME ,B.WEB_URL ,B.INS_DT ,B.UPD_DT FROM JWORK_CODE A ,TCM_IMG B WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CODE_GROUP = 'CAIM' AND B.DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND B.IMG_GUBUN_CD(+) = 'CAIK0400' AND A.CODE = B.IMG_SECT1_CD(+) AND B.MAST_CD(+) = #{s_movie_cd} ORDER BY A.CODE_SEQ
